text:
Company: Shepherd, Henry and Wiggins

Job Title: e-Discovery Analyst

Job Summary:

Shepherd, Henry and Wiggins is seeking an experienced e-Discovery Analyst to join our team. As an e-Discovery Analyst, you will be responsible for managing electronic data and documents for legal cases, conducting thorough searches, and analyzing data to identify relevant information.

Responsibilities:

 Manage and analyze large datasets for legal cases
 Conduct thorough searches to identify relevant information
 Collaborate with legal teams to develop search strategies
 Develop and implement efficient data management processes
 Ensure data quality and integrity

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in e-discovery or a related field
 Strong understanding of electronic data management and analysis
 Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field

Perks and Benefits:

 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $65,000 to $80,000 USD, based on your experience and skills.
 Comprehensive health insurance
 401(k) matching program
 Opportunities for professional growth and development
 Collaborative and dynamic work environment
